fields.description:
*Assessment*

euca-describe-groups displays the following for a given security group that has ingress rules for a specific security group:
{code}
 euca-describe-groups ssl-nginx --region account1-user01@
GROUP	sg-5F6ACB71	408396244283	ssl-nginx	Security Group for HTTPS/SSL Nginx Web Servers
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	tcp	1	65535	FROM	USER	944786667073	ID	sg-5DFC77A3	ingress
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	udp	1	65535	FROM	USER	944786667073	ID	sg-5DFC77A3	ingress
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
{code}

AWS tools (ec2-authorize/aws ec2 describe-security-groups), display the following:
{code}
$ ec2-describe-group  nginx-test
GROUP	sg-7436911e	048212016277	nginx-test	Nginx Test Group
PERMISSION	048212016277	nginx-test	ALLOWS	icmp	-1	-1	FROM	USER	amazon-elb	NAME amazon-elb-sg	ID sg-843f59ed	ingress
PERMISSION	048212016277	nginx-test	ALLOWS	tcp	0	65535	FROM	USER	amazon-elb	NAME amazon-elb-sg	ID sg-843f59ed	ingress
PERMISSION	048212016277	nginx-test	ALLOWS	udp	0	65535	FROM	USER	amazon-elb	NAME amazon-elb-sg	ID sg-843f59ed	ingress
PERMISSION	048212016277	nginx-test	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress

$ aws ec2 describe-security-groups --group-name nginx-test --profile harold-work
SECURITYGROUPS	Nginx Test Group	sg-7436911e	nginx-test	048212016277
IPPERMISSIONS	-1	icmp	-1
USERIDGROUPPAIRS	sg-843f59ed	amazon-elb-sg	amazon-elb
IPPERMISSIONS	0	tcp	65535
USERIDGROUPPAIRS	sg-843f59ed	amazon-elb-sg	amazon-elb
IPPERMISSIONS	0	udp	65535
USERIDGROUPPAIRS	sg-843f59ed	amazon-elb-sg	amazon-elb
IPPERMISSIONS	22	tcp	22
IPRANGES	0.0.0.0/0
{code}

Looking at the --debug output of euca-authorize, the _groupName_ is received, but it seems its not displayed:
{code}
# euca-describe-groups ssl-nginx --region account1-user01@ --debug
2014-05-31 07:39:45,771 DEBUG   DescribeSecurityGroups parsed arguments: {'group': ['ssl-nginx'], 'filters': None, 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'region': 'account1-user01@', 'show_empty_fields': False, 'key_id': None, 'secret_key': None}
2014-05-31 07:39:45,771 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2014-05-31 07:39:45,771 INFO    Config   found   default-region = ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config finding region option verify-ssl
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 DEBUG   Config   section ViciousLiesAndDangerousRumors
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 DEBUG   Config   section *
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config   novalue for verify-ssl
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 INFO    Config finding user option key-id
2014-05-31 07:39:45,772 DEBUG   Config   section account1-user01
2014-05-31 07:39:45,773 INFO    Config   found   account1-user01::key-id = 'AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA'
2014-05-31 07:39:45,773 INFO    Config finding user option secret-key
2014-05-31 07:39:45,773 DEBUG   Config   section account1-user01
2014-05-31 07:39:45,773 INFO    Config   found   account1-user01::secret-key = <redacted>
2014-05-31 07:39:45,776 INFO    DescribeSecurityGroups parameters: {'GroupName.1': 'ssl-nginx', 'Action': 'DescribeSecurityGroups', 'Version': '2013-02-01'}
2014-05-31 07:39:45,776 INFO    EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3)
2014-05-31 07:39:45,777 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\ncompute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773\n/\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA&Action=DescribeSecurityGroups&GroupName.1=ssl-nginx&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-05-31T14%3A39%3A45Z&Version=2013-02-01'
2014-05-31 07:39:45,777 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: suOkUmj4AjkaNxk+uqdEukRrlYJB1y7/h1g/Mcgnb34=
2014-05-31 07:39:45,777 DEBUG   QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request method: POST
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request url:    http://compute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Content-Length: 250
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request header: Host: compute.acme.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773
2014-05-31 07:39:45,785 DEBUG   EC2 request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.1.0 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-431.17.1.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.1 requests/1.1.0
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   AWSAccessKeyId: AKI6GWITDEHGJIEBTREA
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Action: DescribeSecurityGroups
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   GroupName.1: ssl-nginx
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Signature: suOkUmj4AjkaNxk+uqdEukRrlYJB1y7/h1g/Mcgnb34=
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   SignatureMethod: HmacSHA256
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   SignatureVersion: 2
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Timestamp: 2014-05-31T14:39:45Z
2014-05-31 07:39:45,786 DEBUG   EC2 request data:   Version: 2013-02-01
2014-05-31 07:39:46,059 DEBUG   EC2 response time: 0.272 seconds
2014-05-31 07:39:46,059 INFO    EC2 response status: 200
2014-05-31 07:39:46,059 DEBUG   EC2 response header: content-length: 1103
2014-05-31 07:39:46,059 DEBUG   EC2 response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8
2014-05-31 07:39:46,059 DEBUG   DescribeSecurityGroups -- response content --
<DescribeSecurityGroupsResponse xmlns="http://ec2.amazonaws.com/doc/2013-02-01/"><requestId>01486dd1-6da0-4104-b42e-9e0416d3bad9</requestId><securityGroupInfo><item><ownerId>408396244283</ownerId><groupId>sg-5F6ACB71</groupId><groupName>ssl-nginx</groupName><groupDescription>Security Group for HTTPS/SSL Nginx Web Servers</groupDescription><ipPermissions><item><ipProtocol>tcp</ipProtocol><fromPort>1</fromPort><toPort>65535</toPort><groups><item><userId>944786667073</userId><groupName>euca-internal-408396244283-SSLNginxLoadBalancer</groupName><groupId>sg-5DFC77A3</groupId></item></groups><ipRanges/></item><item><ipProtocol>tcp</ipProtocol><fromPort>22</fromPort><toPort>22</toPort><groups/><ipRanges><item><cidrIp>0.0.0.0/0</cidrIp></item></ipRanges></item><item><ipProtocol>udp</ipProtocol><fromPort>1</fromPort><toPort>65535</toPort><groups><item><userId>944786667073</userId><groupName>euca-internal-408396244283-SSLNginxLoadBalancer</groupName><groupId>sg-5DFC77A3</groupId></item></groups><ipRanges/></item></ipPermissions><tagSet/></item></securityGroupInfo></DescribeSecurityGroupsResponse>
2014-05-31 07:39:46,060 DEBUG   DescribeSecurityGroups -- end of response content --
GROUP	sg-5F6ACB71	408396244283	ssl-nginx	Security Group for HTTPS/SSL Nginx Web Servers
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	tcp	1	65535	FROM	USER	944786667073	ID	sg-5DFC77A3	ingress
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	tcp	22	22	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	408396244283	ssl-nginx	ALLOWS	udp	1	65535	FROM	USER	944786667073	ID	sg-5DFC77A3	ingress
{code}

*Pertinent Data*

This would be helpful for the situation when ELB security groups are ingress to a given security group.  It will make it easier for cloud users to see which security group is associated with a given ELB.
fields.summary: euca-describe-groups displays security groups ingressed for a particular security group different than ec2-authorize/aws ec2 describe-security-groups

comments.body:
Fixed in commit {{c6c6c21}}

On the bright side, their documentation now appears to match the commands' actual behavior.

[~gholms],

Issue has been verified as fixed.  The output doesn't _exactly_ match AWS since we use unique security group names and not the 'amazon-elb-sg' name (see EUCA-9486), however the display has been fixed based upon the description of this bug.  Thanks for the hard work here.

*Steps*

# Clone [euca2ools repository from Github|https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools.git]
# After [building and installing euca2ools from master branch|https://github.com/eucalyptus/euca2ools/blob/master/INSTALL], confirm the release containing the fix for this ticket:
{code}
# euca-version
euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-68-gccf0d6e (Apollo)

# git branch -v
* master    ccf0d6e Make euare-userlistcerts show certificates' user names

# git log --pretty=format:"%h - %an, %ar : %s" | grep c6c6c21
c6c6c21 - Garrett Holmstrom, 6 days ago : Make describing/modifying security groups always show names
{code}
# On [Group #2 cloud|https://eucalyptus.atlassian.net/wiki/display/QA/Euca+4.1+Quality+Dashboard#Euca4.1QualityDashboard-TypeofDeployments], apply the following IAM access policy to a group under a given account:
{code}
# euare-grouplistpolicies -v -g Testers --region admin-hspencer2@group2
EUCA9844
{
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1419265568046",
      "Action": [
        "s3:CreateBucket",
        "s3:DeleteBucket",
        "s3:DeleteBucketPolicy",
        "s3:GetBucketAcl",
        "s3:GetBucketPolicy",
        "s3:GetLifecycleConfiguration",
        "s3:ListAllMyBuckets",
        "s3:ListBucket",
        "s3:ListBucketVersions",
        "s3:PutBucketAcl",
        "s3:PutBucketPolicy",
        "s3:GetBucketTagging",
        "s3:PutBucketTagging",
        "s3:PutLifecycleConfiguration"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1420595402932",
      "Action": [
        "ec2:AssociateRouteTable",
        "ec2:AttachInternetGateway",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:AuthorizeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:CreateInternetGateway",

        "ec2:CreateRoute",
        "ec2:CreateRouteTable",
        "ec2:CreateSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:CreateSubnet",
        "ec2:CreateTags",
        "ec2:CreateVpc",
        "ec2:DeleteInternetGateway",
        "ec2:DeleteNetworkAcl",
        "ec2:DeleteNetworkAclEntry",
        "ec2:DeleteRoute",
        "ec2:DeleteRouteTable",
        "ec2:DeleteSecurityGroup",
        "ec2:DeleteSubnet",
        "ec2:DeleteTags",
        "ec2:DeleteVpc",
        "ec2:DescribeAvailabilityZones",
        "ec2:DescribeInstanceStatus",
        "ec2:DescribeInstances",
        "ec2:DescribeInternetGateways",
        "ec2:DescribeKeyPairs",
        "ec2:DescribeNetworkAcls",
        "ec2:DescribeRouteTables",
        "ec2:DescribeSecurityGroups",
        "ec2:DescribeSubnets",
        "ec2:DescribeTags",
        "ec2:DescribeVpcAttribute",
        "ec2:DescribeVpcs",
        "ec2:DetachInternetGateway",
        "ec2:DisassociateRouteTable",
        "ec2:ModifyVpcAttribute",
        "ec2:ReplaceNetworkAclAssociation",
        "ec2:ReplaceNetworkAclEntry",
        "ec2:ReplaceRoute",
        "ec2:ReplaceRouteTableAssociation",
        "ec2:RevokeSecurityGroupEgress",
        "ec2:RevokeSecurityGroupIngress",
        "ec2:RunInstances",
        "ec2:MonitorInstances",
        "ec2:UnmonitorInstances",
        "ec2:TerminateInstances"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1420595784783",
      "Action": [
        "cloudformation:CreateStack",
        "cloudformation:DeleteStack",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackEvents",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResource",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStackResources",
        "cloudformation:DescribeStacks",
        "cloudformation:ListStacks",
        "cloudformation:ListStackResources"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1420595849078",
      "Action": [
        "cloudwatch:DeleteAlarms",
        "cloudwatch:DescribeAlarmHistory",
        "cloudwatch:DescribeAlarms",
        "cloudwatch:DescribeAlarmsForMetric",
        "cloudwatch:DisableAlarmActions",
        "cloudwatch:EnableAlarmActions",

        "cloudwatch:ListMetrics",
        "cloudwatch:PutMetricAlarm",
        "cloudwatch:PutMetricData"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1420595969789",
      "Action": [
        "autoscaling:CreateAutoScalingGroup",
        "autoscaling:CreateLaunchConfiguration",
        "autoscaling:CreateOrUpdateTags",
        "autoscaling:DeleteAutoScalingGroup",
        "autoscaling:DeleteLaunchConfiguration",
        "autoscaling:DeletePolicy",
        "autoscaling:DeleteTags",
        "autoscaling:DescribeAdjustmentTypes",
        "autoscaling:DescribeAutoScalingGroups",
        "autoscaling:DescribeAutoScalingInstances",
        "autoscaling:DescribeLaunchConfigurations",
        "autoscaling:DescribeMetricCollectionTypes",
        "autoscaling:DescribeNotificationConfigurations",
        "autoscaling:DescribePolicies",

      ],

    },
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1420596120628",
      "Action": [
        "elasticloadbalancing:AddTags",
        "elasticloadbalancing:ApplySecurityGroupsToLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:AttachLoadBalancerToSubnets",
        "elasticloadbalancing:ConfigureHealthCheck",
        "elasticloadbalancing:CreateLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:CreateLoadBalancerListeners",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DeleteLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DeleteLoadBalancerListeners",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DeregisterInstancesFromLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DescribeInstanceHealth",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DescribeLoadBalancerAttributes",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DescribeLoadBalancers",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DescribeTags",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DetachLoadBalancerFromSubnets",
        "elasticloadbalancing:DisableAvailabilityZonesForLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:EnableAvailabilityZonesForLoadBalancer",
        "elasticloadbalancing:ModifyLoadBalancerAttributes",
        "elasticloadbalancing:RemoveTags",
        "elasticloadbalancing:RegisterInstancesWithLoadBalancer"
      ],
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}
{code}
{code}
# euare-grouplistusers -g Testers --region admin-hspencer2@group2
arn:aws:iam::804231923627:group/Testers
   users
   arn:aws:iam::804231923627:user/tessai
{code}
# Using the attached template (cfn-euca9844-template.json), create a cloudformation stack:
{code}
# euform-create-stack EUCA9844 --template-file cfn-euca9844-template.json --parameter "UbuntuImageId=emi-e26c03c3" --parameter "UserKeyPair=tessai" --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region tessai-group2@group2
arn:aws:cloudformation::804231923627:stack/EUCA9844/46d33603-4cf7-4ad0-bf36-e7efe05b578f
{code}
# Confirm the stack completed successfully:
{code}
# euform-describe-stacks --region tessai-group2@group2
STACK	EUCA9844-BucketStack-KNQATNSMPMVL5	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	Cloudformation Example => Create bucket with public-read access control list (ACL)	2015-01-22T05:11:06.919Z
OUTPUT	BucketName	euca9844-bucketstack-knqatnsmpmvl5-s3bucket-fccpb0kezcvmu
STACK	EUCA9844	CREATE_COMPLETE	Complete!	CloudFormation template to launch a highly available Nginx web stack in Eucalyptus VPC	2015-01-22T05:11:02.339Z
PARAMETER	UbuntuImageId		emi-e26c03c3
PARAMETER	UserKeyPair		tessai
PARAMETER	InstanceType		m1.xlarge
PARAMETER	MinSize		2
PARAMETER	MaxSize		4
OUTPUT	ELBURL	http://EUCA9844-NginxELB-1BPLGUWSZJKR4-804231923627.lb.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
OUTPUT	BucketName	euca9844-s3bucket-icdadhvvg8dhn
OUTPUT	StackRef	arn:aws:cloudformation::804231923627:stack/EUCA9844-BucketStack-KNQATNSMPMVL5/d61b0d26-c9f3-4306-9b04-428abb944bfd
OUTPUT	OutputFromNestedStack	euca9844-bucketstack-knqatnsmpmvl5-s3bucket-fccpb0kezcvmu
{code}
# List ELB, showing all attributes (to see the security group associated with the ELB):
{code}
# eulb-describe-lbs --region tessai-group2@group2 --show-long
LOAD_BALANCER	EUCA9844-NginxELB-1BPLGUWSZJKR4	EUCA9844-NginxELB-1BPLGUWSZJKR4-804231923627.lb.c-06.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com			{interval=90,target=HTTP:80/,timeout=60,healthy-threshold=3,unhealthy-threshold=5}	one	subnet-f73ac1f2	vpc-216adbc1	i-64ec8a64,i-cd3c2aad	{protocol=HTTP,lb-port=80,instance-port=80}					{owner-alias=804231923627,group-name=EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP}	{sg-8c23c817}	2015-01-22T05:11:24.963Z	internet-facing
{code}
# List security groups based upon the tag-key and tag-value of the cloudformation stack name. Notice how the ingress rules now contain the name of the ELB security group:
{code}
# euca-describe-groups --region tessai-group2@group2 --filter tag-key=aws:cloudformation:stack-name --filter tag-value=EUCA9844
GROUP	sg-33064b0e	804231923627	EUCA9844-InstanceSecurityGroup-QM7RPZ63C1GEQ	Enable HTTP access on 80 and 443 from ELB.	vpc-216adbc1
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-InstanceSecurityGroup-QM7RPZ63C1GEQ	ALLOWS	tcp	80	80	FROM	USER	804231923627	NAME	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ID	sg-8c23c817	ingress
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-InstanceSecurityGroup-QM7RPZ63C1GEQ	ALLOWS	tcp	443	443	FROM	USER	804231923627	NAME	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ID	sg-8c23c817	ingress
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-InstanceSecurityGroup-QM7RPZ63C1GEQ	ALLOWS	-1			TO	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	egress
TAG	security-group	sg-33064b0e	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	InstanceSecurityGroup
TAG	security-group	sg-33064b0e	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::804231923627:stack/EUCA9844/46d33603-4cf7-4ad0-bf36-e7efe05b578f
TAG	security-group	sg-33064b0e	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	EUCA9844
GROUP	sg-8c23c817	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	Enable HTTP access on port 80	vpc-216adbc1
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ALLOWS	tcp	443	443	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ALLOWS	tcp	80	80	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ALLOWS	tcp	80	80	TO	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	egress
PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ALLOWS	tcp	443	443	TO	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	egress
TAG	security-group	sg-8c23c817	aws:cloudformation:logical-id	LoadBalancerSecurityGroup
TAG	security-group	sg-8c23c817	aws:cloudformation:stack-id	arn:aws:cloudformation::804231923627:stack/EUCA9844/46d33603-4cf7-4ad0-bf36-e7efe05b578f
TAG	security-group	sg-8c23c817	aws:cloudformation:stack-name	EUCA9844

euca2ools 3.2.0-pre1-24-gacb04e8 (Apollo)

PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-InstanceSecurityGroup-QM7RPZ63C1GEQ	ALLOWS	tcp	80	80	FROM	USER	804231923627	ID	sg-8c23c817	ingress

PERMISSION	804231923627	EUCA9844-LoadBalancerSecurityGroup-SCUX5Y40HNMKP	ALLOWS	tcp	443	443	FROM	CIDR	0.0.0.0/0	ingress
